title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: AAVE Drops 2.9% as Index Inches Lower From Thursday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Cardano (ADA) was also among the underperformers, falling 2.9%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2918.27, down 0.2% (-6.41) since 4 p.m. ET on Thursday.

Thirteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: HBAR (+7.0%) and DOT (+5.2%).

Laggards: AAVE (-2.9%) and ADA (-2.9%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index declined 0.2% with more assets trading lower than higher, and notable underperformers like AAVE and ADA both dropping 2.9%.
